original: Nahetuṁ nosaññojanaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nahetuṁ noganthaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ….
analyzed: na hetum no saññojanam dhammam paṭicca pe na hetum nogantham dhammam paṭicca

original: Nahetuṁ nooghaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nahetuṁ noyogaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ….
analyzed: na hetum no ogham dhammam paṭicca pe na hetum no yogam dhammam paṭicca
na hetum na unīvaraṇam dhammam paṭicca
na hetum na uparāmāsam dhammam paṭicca
